shortdesc.ph: Results of the uplink and downlink last-mile network tests.

plentry.pd:
The status of the last-mile network tests. See .
1: the last-mile network probe test is complete.
2: the last-mile network probe test is incomplete and the bandwidth estimation is not available, probably due to limited test resources.
3: the last-mile network probe test is not carried out, probably due to poor network conditions.
Results of the uplink last-mile network test. See .
Results of the downlink last-mile network test. See .
